name: BugBots
description:
This game is a top-down 2d shooter where you play as a new age bugbot searching for energy crystals form the enemy old rusty bots that are trying to dominate you and your kind. Watching out for enemies that are trying to destroy you and obstacles that can that deal demage. This small game has all 10 levels.

Press [] for Control A or [] for Control B.

Control A:
Aim with mouse to go in the direction you want to go.
Forward is [] or [].
Strafe right/left of bugbot is [→] / [←] or [] / [].
Backward is [] or []

Control B:
Move mouse to aim.
Up is [] or [W].
Right/left is [→] / [←] or [] / [] .
Down is [] or [] .

Left mouse Button is to Fire.
[] to Pause.
